rooms.description: Open space adjoining the central courtyard; designed for comfortable seating and dining.
Provides Vastu-compliant north-east facing orientation with ample natural light.
Smaller bedroom oriented towards a quiet area of the ground floor.
En-suite bathroom designed for privacy and functionality.
Efficient layout with modern cabinetry and central courtyard view.
Compact storage area for kitchen supplies and general household items.
Two-car garage with direct access from the exterior; designed to be multifunctional if required.

openings.description: North-facing entrance ensuring Vastu-compliant positive energy flow; designed as a welcoming space.
Strategically placed windows for maximum natural light and ventilation.
Openings connecting the interior living spaces with the central courtyard to enhance air circulation and visual connectivity.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard designed as a serene open space enhancing natural light, ventilation, and energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with private balcony; north-east facing for auspicious energy.
Cozy guest room complementing the ground floor layout.
Dedicated workspace with natural lighting and minimal distractions; ideal for remote work.
Functional bathroom layout to serve both master and guest rooms.

openings.description: Private balcony providing a view of the courtyard and enhancing air circulation.
Windows strategically placed for optimal natural light and ventilation on upper level.

design_principles.description: Clean lines, open spaces, and functional layouts with minimalistic design elements.
North-facing entrance and proper room orientation to promote positive energy flow.
Efficient use of space and materials, with multifunctional areas like the garage and courtyard.

budget_constraints: Tight budget; design optimized for cost-effective construction without compromising on aesthetic or functionality.
